meanings.sent1: The establishment of rules is important for order.
meanings.sent2: The establishment of a new law took months of discussion.
meanings.sent3: The establishment of a bedtime for the pets led to chaos.
meanings.sent4: The establishment of trust between friends is like building a bridge.
meanings.sent5: The establishment of a routine can help with time management.

meanings.definition: A place of business or organization.
meanings.sent1: The local establishment serves delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The new establishment in town is a bookstore.
meanings.sent3: The establishment of a lemonade stand was a hit with the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The establishment of a bakery brought sweet smells to the street.
meanings.sent5: The establishment of a school provides education to many children.

meanings.definition: A group of people in a society with a common interest.
meanings.sent1: The birdwatching establishment meets every Saturday.
meanings.sent2: The establishment of artists collaborated on a mural.
meanings.sent3: The establishment of dog lovers organized a charity event.
meanings.sent4: The establishment of book club members shared their favorite reads.
meanings.sent5: The establishment of sports fans cheered together at the game.
